MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CA6, DG11, DG14, DG16 postcode areas of Carlisle, Lockerbie, Canonbie and Gretna. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified faulty overhead line equipment near Rosomond Court and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:45am on 11th April.
